text:
Knoq in Seattle, WA is looking for a Senior Rails Engineer: https://www.knoq.com/jobs

Knoq.com is a well-funded startup that bring neighbors together and helps them get things done. We are revolutionizing the way household services are bought and facilitating neighborly interaction. We give people the ability to choose the level of interaction with their neighbors while still enjoying the best aspects of the place they live. Knoq also is a strong advocate of local small business and gives them incredible tools to run their business better and integrate themselves into the community.
